Texts.Chs: 抵抗组织领导人的飞船日志
事实证明，与其他抵抗力量接触是困难的。我们总是不确定自己是否被跟踪。在许多行星上，我们已经发现了独立的神殿，阿维斯的崇拜者侵扰着它们，等着我们上门。他们是从哪里来的？到我们的目的地会有这么快？我担心我们会在这艘船上度过余生。
Texts.Eng: Contact with the other pockets of resistance has proven to be difficult. We're always unsure if we are being followed. On many planets we have found standalone temples with Ahvis' worshippers infesting them, ready for us. Where do they even come from to get to our destinations this fast? I fear we may spend the rest of our lives on this ship.
